sentences.en: because of Frankie she had rejected the opportunity of a lifetime.
sentences.cn: 都是因为弗兰克，她才放弃了终生难遇的机会。

sentences.en: Churchill was held in near veneration during his lifetime.
sentences.cn: 丘吉尔在世时，人们对他近乎崇拜。

sentences.en: Getting that story was the scoop of a lifetime for the journalist.
sentences.cn: 获得那个消息是这位记者终身难逢的独家新闻.

sentences.en: Having spent a lifetime avidly courting publicity, Paul has suddenly become secretive.
sentences.cn: 保罗一生都在想方设法出风头，现在却突然行事低调了。

sentences.en: He wrote many books during his lifetime.
I have had enough obloquy for one lifetime.
I wouldn't see another chance such as this in my lifetime.
sentences.cn: 我一生都不会再有这样的机会了。

sentences.en: I've spent a lifetime fighting against racism and prejudice.
sentences.cn: 我一辈子都在同种族主义和偏见作斗争。

sentences.en: It would require more than a lifetime.
sentences.cn: 这件事一辈子也做不完.

sentences.en: It's the chance of a lifetime.
sentences.cn: 这是一生中难得再遇到的机会.

sentences.en: It’s the sort of opportunity you see only once in a lifetime.
sentences.cn: 这种机会你一辈子也只能碰到一次。

sentences.en: Say's writings reached a wide audience during his lifetime.
sentences.cn: 在塞伊有生之年，他的作品拥有大量的读者。

sentences.en: The world has turned topsy-turvy in my lifetime.
sentences.cn: 在我的一生中世界已经变得一团糟。

sentences.en: They saved for years for their trip of a lifetime to Hawaii.
sentences.cn: 为了一辈子能到夏威夷一游,他们储蓄了好几年.

sentences.en: This bike will last me a lifetime.
sentences.cn: 这辆自行车够我用一辈子了.

sentences.en: Works of art are in trust to us during our lifetime.
sentences.cn: 艺术品交由我们托管一生。

sentences.en: You've given a lifetime of service to athletics.
sentences.cn: 你为田径运动贡献了一生。

phrases.tran_cn: （机会，经历）终生难遇的，一生只有一回的

trans.tran_cn: 一生，寿命，有生之年，存在期，有效期
trans.tran_en: the period of time during which someone is alive or something exists
